<title level="1" pfs="">[Shanrigol Behemoth](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1051)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Shanrigols that grow with the additions of many living victims can become truly enormous in size and pose a greater danger in their expanding hunting territories. Subterranean communities have collapsed entire tunnels to prevent the creatures from reaching their settlements.

 Many shanrigol behemoths absorb enough brain matter to form crude intelligences and take a serpentine or humanoid shape. They're more varied in their abilities than shanrigol heaps, as they often gain abilities from their constituent creatures. The shanrigol behemoth presented below contains flesh from [driders](/Monsters.aspx?ID=207) and [urdefhans](/Traits.aspx?ID=315), giving it a web attack and necrotic decay ability. Not all shanrigol behemoths have these two abilities, but should have other abilities to replace them.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Aberration](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 28

**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 28

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 26

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 23
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Shanrigol_ShanrigolBehemoth.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 9">[Shanrigol Behemoth](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1051)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Gargantuan" />
<trait label="Aberration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=1" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #164: Hands of the Devil](/Sources.aspx?ID=75) pg. 85</row>

**Perception** +18; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [tremorsense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=40) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +20, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +16

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +7

**Dex** +4

**Con** +3

**Int** -4

**Wis** +3

**Cha** -5
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 27 [all-around vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=1)

**Fort** +21 

**Ref** +18 

**Will** +16 

</row>

**HP** 140
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Resistances**
slashing 10, piercing 10

**Weaknesses**
[positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128) 10

**Necrotic Decay** ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [negative](/Traits.aspx?ID=118)) When the shanrigol behemoth dies, its flesh rots away and sublimates into a foul-smelling gas that fills a 5-foot emanation around the body. This gas deals 9d6 negative damage to creatures in this area as their flesh curdles and rots as well (DC 27 basic Fortitude save).

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, climb 20 feet, swim 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fleshy slap +21 ([Forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=180), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d10+11 bludgeoning plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
bone shard +18 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [range increment 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d12+11 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
web +18 ([range increment 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** web trap

**Sapping Squeeze** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** The shanrigol has a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20); **Effect** The shanrigol squeezes the life essence from its target, dealing 1d10+11 bludgeoning and 1d6 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) (DC 25 basic Fortitude save). The shanrigol regains temporary Hit Points equal to half the amount of bludgeoning damage a single target takes; these temporary Hit Points last for 1 minute.

**Shred Flesh**   A shanrigol behemoth's attacks brutally rend its foes. Creatures critically hit by the shanrigol's fleshy slap Strike take an additional 2d6 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) and are [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) for as long as they are bleeding.

**Undulating Step** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The shanrigol separates its flesh from its bones to fit through small spaces. It Strides, ignoring difficult terrain and fitting through tight spaces as though it were a Tiny creature. It can't use any actions other than Undulating Step until it occupies an area large enough for its normal form.

**Web Trap**    A creature hit by the shanrigol behemoth's web attack is [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24) and stuck to the nearest surface until it can [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79)

</column>
